content.en: Enhancing Liver Diagnosis: Researchers are exploring the use of deep learning algorithms, specifically convolutional neural networks (CNNs), to improve the diagnosis and classification of liver diseases. These algorithms are being trained to differentiate liver masses, segment healthy and cancerous liver tissues, classify hepatic lesions, and detect and classify focal liver lesions. By analyzing various medical imaging techniques such as CT scans and MRI, these algorithms have the potential to assist doctors in accurately diagnosing liver diseases and providing appropriate treatment.
content.da: Forbedring af leverdiagnose: Forskere undersøger brugen af dyb læringsalgoritmer, specifikt konvolutionelle neurale netværk (CNN'er), for at forbedre diagnosen og klassifikationen af leversygdomme. Disse algoritmer trænes til at differentiere levermasser, segmentere sunde og kræftsyge levervæv, klassificere hepatisk læsioner og opdage og klassificere fokale leverlæsioner. Ved at analysere forskellige medicinske billedteknikker såsom CT-scanninger og MR, har disse algoritmer potentialet til at assistere læger i nøjagtigt at diagnosticere leversygdomme og give passende behandling.
